item.title: About
item.description: Noozama Vision Statement Noozama will be used as a mobile shopping companion for customers to order items – normally sold physically over multiple stores or vendors – over the convenience of the Internet.

item.title: Features
item.description: Shopping cart - Add items to your shopping cart - View the items currently in your cart - Alter the quantity of each item in your cart Checkout - Purchase the items in your shopping cart - Apple Pay supported!

item.title: Our Team
item.description: Britt By doing this project I learned how to read from and develop off of another person’s code.

item.title: Retrospective
item.description: What went right in the development process?
